Articles.Content:
Ok even though my ship is the focus it has stopped showing in orbital view. I'd rather not exit and restart if I can avoid it because of the limitations after you do a quickload, so if there is something I can do to get my ship icon to show up again let me know, please. This seems to have happened when I set focus to the Mun, I unset it and used backspace to set it to my ship but it doesn't come back.

Edited February 2, 2014 by kBob
Well that's weird, I guess you've closed and opened the map a few times, what about switching to another vessel?
Try mousing up to the top of the map. There are drop down icons up there to show/hide the various types of ship, flag etc. Perhaps you set it to only show flags?.

Hey Rhomphaia, that did the trick, never even noticed them before, must have accidently clicked up there.

Thank you.

Edit: now how do I mark this thread as Answered?
to mark as answered go to the first post, click go advanced, and change the title to answered
